Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: Techman
Reviews.Content: Another model from an HP builder.For  my money there is no other server with storage better priced than these from VSS.It even has a 5 year warranty , so I can worry about my business not my security cameras

ProductInfo.Features:
4TB of IP video storage Record all 24 cameras at high resolution for 30 days
24 Pre-loaded Milestone Protect Essential camera licenses
Protected by a 5-Year on-site next business day HP warranty including the hard drives and firmware updates Coverage provided by HP global service team
View and control video on your mobile devices from anywhere in the world
Every unit hand built in the USA and fully tested prior to shipment
ProductInfo.Name: Video Storage Solutions VSS220-4TB-24ES VSS Ready To Use IP Video Recorder (Black)
